content:
# The stone has been successfully inserted into the furnace, and it is now in a "WORKING" state, consuming 4 units of coal as fuel.
# The furnace has 3 units of stone remaining to be smelted into stone bricks.

# I will wait for the furnace to finish smelting the stone into stone bricks. 
# Once it is done, I can check the results and continue with my factory setup.

# Let's monitor the furnace status until it completes the smelting process.
while furnace.status == 'WORKING':
    # Simulate waiting for the furnace to complete its task
    wait(1)  # Wait for 1 second (this is a placeholder for actual wait logic)
    print(f"Current furnace status: {furnace.status}, Fuel remaining: {furnace.fuel['coal']}, Stone remaining: {furnace.furnace_source['stone']}")
    
# After the furnace finishes, I will check the inventory for the produced stone bricks. 
print(f"Final inventory: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check the final inventory after smelting is complete.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the entities on the map to see if the furnace is still present.
